verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w about|strong="G2596"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w* the \w king|strong="G0935"\w* stretched \w forth|strong="G1911"\w* \add his\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* to \w vex|strong="G2559"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*.
\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w killed|strong="G0337"\w* \w James|strong="G2385"\w* the \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* of \w John|strong="G2491"\w* with the \w sword|strong="G3162"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w because|strong="G3754"\w* he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* it \w pleased|strong="G0701"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, he proceeded \w further|strong="G4369"\w* to \w take|strong="G4815"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*. (\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* the \w days|strong="G2250"\w* of unleavened \w bread|strong="G0106"\w*.)

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3739"\w* he had apprehended \w him|strong="G4084"\w*, he \w put|strong="G5087"\w* \add him\add* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w prison|strong="G5438"\w*, and \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \add him\add* to \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w quaternions|strong="G5069"\w* of \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* to \w keep|strong="G5442"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w intending|strong="G1014"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w Easter|strong="G3957"\w* to \w bring|strong="G0321"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w forth|strong="G0321"\w* to the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* was \w kept|strong="G5083"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w prison|strong="G5438"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w prayer|strong="G4335"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* without \w ceasing|strong="G1618"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w* \w would|strong="G3195"\w* have \w brought|strong="G4254"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w forth|strong="G4254"\w*, the \w same|strong="G1565"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w sleeping|strong="G2837"\w* \w between|strong="G3342"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w*, \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* with \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w chains|strong="G0254"\w*: \w and|strong="G5037"\w* the \w keepers|strong="G5441"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* the \w door|strong="G2374"\w* \w kept|strong="G5083"\w* the \w prison|strong="G5438"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* came \w upon|strong="G2186"\w* \add him\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w light|strong="G5457"\w* \w shined|strong="G2989"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w prison|strong="G3612"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* he \w smote|strong="G3960"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* on the \w side|strong="G4125"\w*, and \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Arise|strong="G0450"\w* \w up|strong="G1722"\w* \w quickly|strong="G5034"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w chains|strong="G0254"\w* fell \w off|strong="G1601"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \add his\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, Gird \w thyself|strong="G4024"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* bind \w on|strong="G5265"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w sandals|strong="G4547"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* he \w did|strong="G4160"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Cast|strong="G4016"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w garment|strong="G2440"\w* about \w thee|strong="G4016"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w follow|strong="G0190"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he went \w out|strong="G1831"\w*, and \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wist|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* it \w was|strong="G2076"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w* which was \w done|strong="G1096"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w thought|strong="G1380"\w* he \w saw|strong="G0991"\w* a \w vision|strong="G3705"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* they were \w past|strong="G1330"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w ward|strong="G5438"\w*, they \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* the \w iron|strong="G4603"\w* \w gate|strong="G4439"\w* that \w leadeth|strong="G5342"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*; \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* to \w them|strong="G0846"\w* of his own \w accord|strong="G0844"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they went \w out|strong="G1831"\w*, and passed on \w through|strong="G4281"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w street|strong="G4505"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w forthwith|strong="G2112"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w departed|strong="G0868"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

And \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* was \w come|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Now|strong="G3568"\w* I \w know|strong="G1492"\w* of a \w surety|strong="G0230"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* hath \w sent|strong="G1821"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w delivered|strong="G1807"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* of \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add from\add* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w expectation|strong="G4329"\w* of the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* when he had \w considered|strong="G4894"\w* \add the thing\add*, he \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* the \w house|strong="G3614"\w* of \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* the \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* of \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, whose surname \w was|strong="G1941"\w* \w Mark|strong="G3138"\w*; \w where|strong="G3757"\w* \w many|strong="G2425"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* gathered \w together|strong="G4867"\w* \w praying|strong="G4336"\w*.

And \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w knocked|strong="G2925"\w* at the \w door|strong="G2374"\w* of the \w gate|strong="G4440"\w*, a \w damsel|strong="G3814"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* to \w hearken|strong="G5219"\w*, \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Rhoda|strong="G4498"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when she \w knew|strong="G1921"\w* \w Peter’s|strong="G4074"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, she \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w gate|strong="G4440"\w* \w for|strong="G0575"\w* \w gladness|strong="G5479"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* ran \w in|strong="G1532"\w*, and \w told|strong="G0518"\w* \w how|strong="G2476"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* the \w gate|strong="G4440"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, Thou art \w mad|strong="G3105"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* she constantly \w affirmed|strong="G1340"\w* that it \w was|strong="G2192"\w* even \w so|strong="G3779"\w*. \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* said \w they|strong="G3004"\w*, It \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w continued|strong="G1961"\w* \w knocking|strong="G2925"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* when they had \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* \add the door\add*, and \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, they were \w astonished|strong="G1839"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* he, \w beckoning|strong="G2678"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* with the \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* to hold their \w peace|strong="G4601"\w*, \w declared|strong="G1334"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* had \w brought|strong="G1806"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w prison|strong="G5438"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, Go \w shew|strong="G0518"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* unto \w James|strong="G2385"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w departed|strong="G1831"\w*, and \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* as soon as it \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, there \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w small|strong="G3641"\w* \w stir|strong="G5017"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* was \w become|strong="G1096"\w* of \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w* had \w sought|strong="G1934"\w* for \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* found \w him|strong="G2147"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, he \w examined|strong="G0350"\w* the \w keepers|strong="G5441"\w*, and commanded \w that|strong="G2753"\w* \add they\add* should be put to \w death|strong="G0520"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he went \w down|strong="G2718"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Cæsarea|strong="G2542"\w*, \w and|strong="G1304"\w* \add there\add* \w abode|strong="G1304"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* highly \w displeased|strong="G2371"\w* with them of \w Tyre|strong="G5183"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sidon|strong="G4606"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* they \w came|strong="G3918"\w* with one \w accord|strong="G3661"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, having \w made|strong="G3982"\w* \w Blastus|strong="G0986"\w* the \w king’s|strong="G0935"\w* \w chamberlain|strong="G2846"\w* their \w friend|strong="G3982"\w*, \w desired|strong="G0154"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*; \w because|strong="G1223"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w country|strong="G5561"\w* was \w nourished|strong="G5142"\w* \w by|strong="G0575"\w* the \w king’s|strong="G0937"\w* \add country\add*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* upon a \w set|strong="G5002"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w*, arrayed \w in|strong="G1746"\w* \w royal|strong="G0937"\w* \w apparel|strong="G2066"\w*, \w sat|strong="G2523"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* his \w throne|strong="G0968"\w*, and made an \w oration|strong="G1215"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w people|strong="G1218"\w* gave a \w shout|strong="G2019"\w*, \add saying, It is\add* the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* of a \w god|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* of a \w man|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w immediately|strong="G3916"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w smote|strong="G3960"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w because|strong="G0473"\w* he \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w was|strong="G1096"\w* eaten of \w worms|strong="G4662"\w*, and gave up the \w ghost|strong="G1634"\w*.
¶ \w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w grew|strong="G0837"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w multiplied|strong="G4129"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w* \w returned|strong="G5290"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, when they had \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* \add their\add* \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* took with \w them|strong="G4838"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, whose surname \w was|strong="G1941"\w* \w Mark|strong="G3138"\w*.
